name: The Deep [Alpha]
description:
[ CONTROLS ]
X: Hide in Boxes | Z: Eat People | UP: Enter Room | DOWN: Leave Room


The Lord of Depths demands a new sacrifice, and it's up to you to offer one to Him.

Board a fishing ship, terrorize its crew, feed on their bones and please the Deep One in this thrilling stealth game.

This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33! Vote for it by clicking here!
